org.apache.lucene.search.similarities
Class Similarity.SloppySimScorer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lucene.search.similarities.Similarity.SloppySimScorer
Enclosing class:
Similarity
public abstract static class Similarity.SloppySimScorer
extends Object

API for scoring "sloppy" queries such as SpanQuery and sloppy PhraseQuery.

Frequencies are floating-point values: an approximate within-document frequency adjusted for "sloppiness" by computeSlopFactor(int).
